document_data.name: Pipestone
document_data.Description: Pipestone was a soft stone, easily carved. It occurred in colors from brown to red. A typical stone was priced at 1 gp per pound (4 sp 5cp per kilogram).
document_data.Powers: [[Wizard]] spells that required some type of wood as a material component could use pipestone instead. This did not work for [[divine magic|divine spells]].
